Title: Merlin 1000V gas pressure proving system
Description: The Merlin 1000V gas pressure proving system controls gas using lockable key-switch operation and time out functions. Employing a unique digital transducer, this system tests gas pressure to ensure gas taps are not open and no gas leaks are present. Designed with a user-friendly system status panel and fully labelled PCB, the Merlin gas proving system is easy to use and install, offering inbuilt connectivity for linking to a building's fire alarm and building management systems.
